constructor-arg.value: select * from T_PRM_CUSTOMIZEFILTERCLASSES t where t.lifecycle = 1 and t.id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)
select * from T_PRM_CUSTOMIZEFILTERCLASSES t where t.lifecycle = 1 #if($svcName) and t.service_name=:svcName #end LIMIT 1

select * from T_PRM_CUSTOMIZEFILTERCLASSES where lifecycle !=2
#if($scopeType) and scope_type=:scopeType #end
#if($scopeName) and scope_name=:scopeName #end #if($scopeNameForLike) and scope_name like :scopeNameForLike #end
#if($serviceName) and service_name=:serviceName #end #if($serviceNameForLike) and service_name like :serviceNameForLike #end
#if($lifecycle) and lifecycle=:lifecycle #end
#if($shopId) and shop_id=:shopId #end #if($lifecycle) and lifecycle =:lifecycle #end

select id,cache_second as cacheSecond,cacheversion as cacheVersion,lifecycle,scope_name as scopeName, service_name as serviceName,shop_id as shopId,version,scope_type as scopeType, '' as scopeTypeName from T_PRM_CUSTOMIZEFILTERCLASSES
where lifecycle !=2
#if($scopeType) and scope_type=:scopeType #end #if($scopeName) and scope_name like :scopeName #end
#if($serviceName) and service_name=:serviceName #end #if($serviceNameForLike) and service_name like :serviceNameForLike #end #if($shopId) and shop_id=:shopId #end #if($lifecycle) and lifecycle=:lifecycle #end #if($lifecycle) and lifecycle =:lifecycle #end
update T_PRM_CUSTOMIZEFILTERCLASSES set lifecycle=:state where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)
update T_PRM_CUSTOMIZEFILTERCLASSES set lifecycle=2 where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)

select * from T_PRM_CUSTOMIZEFILTERCLASSES where lifecycle=1
#if($scopeType) and scope_type=:scopeType #end
#if($scopeName) and scope_name=:scopeName #end #if($scopeNameForLike) and scope_name like :scopeNameForLike #end
#if($serviceName) and service_name=:serviceName #end #if($serviceNameForLike) and service_name like :serviceNameForLike #end
#if($lifecycle) and lifecycle=:lifecycle #end
#if($shopId) and shop_id=:shopId #end

select * from T_PRM_CUSTOMIZEFILTERCLASSES where lifecycle=1
#if($scopeType) and scope_type=:scopeType #end
#if($scopeName) and scope_name=:scopeName #end #if($scopeNameForLike) and scope_name like :scopeNameForLike #end
#if($serviceName) and service_name=:serviceName #end #if($serviceNameForLike) and service_name like :serviceNameForLike #end
#if($lifecycle) and lifecycle=:lifecycle #end
#if($shopId) and shop_id=:shopId #end

select id,cache_second as cacheSecond,cacheversion as cacheVersion,lifecycle,scope_name as scopeName, service_name as serviceName,shop_id as shopId,version,scope_type as scopeType, '' as scopeTypeName from T_PRM_CUSTOMIZEFILTERCLASSES
where lifecycle !=2
and shop_id=:shopId
#if($scopeType) and scope_type=:scopeType #end #if($scopeName) and scope_name=:scopeName #end #if($scopeNameForLike) and scope_name like :scopeNameForLike #end
#if($serviceName) and service_name=:serviceName #end #if($serviceNameForLike) and service_name like :serviceNameForLike #end
#if($lifecycle) and lifecycle=:lifecycle #end #if($lifecycle) and lifecycle =:lifecycle #end
select id, scope_name as name from T_PRM_CUSTOMIZEFILTERCLASSES where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)
select * from T_PRM_CUSTOMIZEFILTERCLASSES where lifecycle = 1 and scope_type = :type #if($shopId) and shop_id =:shopId #end
